section_title: Third review of the financial mechanism
sentences: The Secretariat introduced this item (FCCC/SBI/2006/7 and 18, MISC.9, MISC.3 and INF.7).
Bangladesh, for LDCs, urged adequate representation on the GEF Council.
The US, the EU and SWITZERLAND supported the work of the GEF as the UNFCCC's financial mechanism.
Marcia Levaggi (Argentina) and Karsten Sach (Germany) will co-chair a contact group.
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
